name: It's Not Easy Being a Bunny
name_original: It's Not Easy Being a Bunny
description:
Recommend Downloading Windows ZipControls on Main-Menu

You are a mamma bunny trying to gather all of her baby bunnies. 

The snakes and wolves have taken them, and now they are coming for you too.

Throw sticks at the snakes and wolves to kill them, or make them run into each other. Watch out though, wolves will gobble a few snakes in their pursuit of you. 

Survive and collect babies to increase your score.

Enemies can drop sunflowers; collect to heal.

 Good luck.

*HTML HighScores will not save after game is closed.

*Windows high scores will save

*audio and other things may be a bit wonky on HTML.
